title: Connecting the next decade of utility innovation with Dr. Sasan Mokhtari
description: At the center of the industry-wide influence that OATI has enabled for the entire energy sector is CEO Dr. Sasan Mokhtari, and we talk with him about what that will mean at DTECH.
content: At the center of the industry-wide influence that OATI has enabled for the entire energy sector is CEO Dr. Sasan Mokhtari, and we talk with him about what that will mean at DTECH.
